EmailTemplate.name: 202006_Global_CH_HCE_Forge_Webinar.202006_Global_CH_Forge_Webinar Invitation_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date – Honeywell Forge Cabin and Cockpit Services Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en]]>
Honeywell Forge Cabin and Cockpit Services Webinar! Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Managers, Carey Miller and Christopher Hughes, for our upcoming webinar: Honeywell Forge Cabin and Cockpit Services!
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will provide information on new products and functionality of Honeywell Forge Cabin and Cockpit services, such as:
- Re branding of GoDirect to Honeywell Forge - Honeywell Forge Dispatch Services - Honeywell Forge Dashboard - International Trip Services - Lite Link - JX Overage Management - Cyber Security & On-Wing Threat Detection
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in identifying global opportunities for the Honeywell Forge Services. DATE June 16th, 2020 TIME 9:30am - 10:30am MST LOCATION Online and On-Demand HOSTED BY Dan Stockfisch PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Q3ePdqNERqixcDdnZXyRtA]]>
This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/eZ00DX02000IQn000Prq00G]]> to let us know! © 2020 Honeywell International Inc. 300 S Tryon St Suite 500, Charlotte, NC 28202 This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AERO_Preference_Center.html]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
